Introduction
============

A portlet to display backward links pointing to the content you're watching.

Description
-----------
This portlet scans the portal in order to find internal links that points to the 
currently viewed content. Those backward links are displayed in the portlet,
following few classic parameters like :

* Number of items to display
* Source content type to use
* Workflow states of the source content type to use
* ...
